# sendAction()

**Instance Method**

Sends the action message to the target.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func sendAction() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if successful; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if no target for the message could be found.

## Related Documentation

- **doDoubleClick(_:)**: Responds to double clicks in a column of the browser.
- **doClick(_:)**: Responds to (single) mouse clicks in a column of the browser.

## Managing Actions

- **doubleAction**: The browser’s double-click action method.
- **sendsActionOnArrowKeys**: A Boolean that indicates whether pressing an arrow key causes an action message to be sent.
